webProjects.title: MemoryTwister
webProjects.subtitle: Indulge yourself in this fun memory game with customized cards and various levels of difficulty. Time is ticking, so be quick!

webProjects.title: Under The Weather
webProjects.subtitle: This straightforward weather app allows you to customize your dashboard with your favorite cities through real-time updates and 5-day forecast.

webProjects.title: ScreenSeeker
webProjects.subtitle: ScreenSeeker is a website where you can view movie and tv show releases with filter options, create a wishlist and rate each feature.

webProjects.title: Yet Another News App
webProjects.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest headlines and create a personalized experience by signing up and bookmarking your favorite articles

phoneProjects.title: PicToPlate
phoneProjects.subtitle: Use AI powered object detection to analyze a photo of your ingredients and generate recipe ideas based on what you have at home.

phoneProjects.title: GiftEase
phoneProjects.subtitle: Create and share wishlists with friends and family, and never miss a special occasion again.
